node.title: A Whole New World
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
In my previous post, I have mentioned [Learning Photography and Editing](https://steemit.com/smartphonephotography/@codingdefined/learning-photography-and-editing-6247aaf0dbb0a) and I continue to learn the sweet essence of Mobile Photography. In this photo, I tried to click Macro Photo with the help of Manual Settings in Nokia 6 and then edited it using SnapSeed. 

So I have taken 3-4 photos of the web with a different angle and then selected the best photo out of it and edited.

![IMG_20180819_174915-01.jpeg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmZEgoxhxRkA65FLh9wXi4ca7cCAA2b7P2gcJCr47gJjXo)

Camera : Nokia 6

node.title: Learning Photography and Editing
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Today I have spent some time in learning photography and the art of editing. So the tips or learning which I have worked on in this image is to use the rule of third, i.e. trying to keep my subject in the points. One more tip was to keep the subject in a frame, I have not got any frame but the AloeVera plant acted as a frame for my subject.
 
![image](https://img.esteem.ws/lbegvhninb.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6, Editing in Snapseed

node.title: Friday Snacks Party
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Friday we used to have snacks party and we call it as a Happy Hour, to start a weekend on the happy note.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/oygdhu6h4v.jpg)

So today we got Dhokla with Red and Green Chatni, Rasgulla, Gulab Jamun and some Potato Chips as the snacks. Since it was an Independence Day week too, we tried to get something unique from a cross the country.

node.title: Claim SteemHunt Tokens as per your Steem Power
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
SteemHunt is recently announced that they are doing 1:1 Hunt tokens airdrop for all Steemians as per their SteemPower. You can check the [announcement here](https://steemit.com/steemhunt/@steemhunt/hunt-token-airdrop-for-sp-holders-is-live-now-or-steemhunt-sponsor-report-16).

So if you have SteemPower (SP) then you are eligible for the airdrop. Just head over to https://steemhunt.com and click on the wallet. After that you can claim your tokens using SP Claim button.

<center>![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUncxPCyn24DcNaB4daDmk8UVsrGqrdxcmjN7LerPpPEV/image.png)</center>

I have got the Hunt Tokens as per my SP as shown below.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmaTVqk829CTddu8NiYPoAp1hXrf1Cwj5aWWd5wHJxXkDC/image.png)

node.title: How I Fixed "this content cannot be displayed in a frame in SSRS 2017"
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
I was getting the error "IFrame: This content cannot be displayed in a frame, To help protect the security of information you enter into this website, the publisher of this content does not allow it to be displayed in a frame." when I tried to Upgrade my ASP.NET application to point to SSRS 2017 instead of SSRS 2012 or 2016.

The things which I have worked on fixing "This content cannot be displayed in a frame" are as follows :

1- I was using ReportViewer to show the SSRS Report in ASP.NET, which I have updated from older Version to the newer version i.e. Version 14. Now my web.config file has below code

```add assembly="Microsoft.ReportViewer.Common, Version=14.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=89845DCD8080CC91"```

```add assembly="Microsoft.ReportViewer.WebForms, Version=14.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=89845DCD8080CC91"```

To Update, first remove the older dependencies from your project and then Install the newer version from the Nuget Package Manager Console Install-Package Microsoft.ReportingServices.ReportViewerControl.WinForms

2- I also added '&rs:embed=true' in the Report URL for all the reports

3- Last thing I have added ```http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"``` for Compatibility for IE 11 and Edge in the aspx page.

Also Posted On My Personal Website : https://www.codingdefined.com/2018/08/how-to-fix-this-content-cannot-be.html
